newsitem.title: JAPAN: Russia cen bank, Japan to discuss gold-backed bonds.
newsitem.headline: Russia cen bank, Japan to discuss gold-backed bonds.

text.p: Russian central bank officials are to meet with several Japanese trading houses in Tokyo this week to discuss the possible use of gold to back bonds issued by the Russian government, a source in Japan said on Monday.
No further details were immediately available.

Traders have speculated that possible precious metal swaps or deliveries as collateral to foreign banks could be part of a major overhaul of the way Russia's often archaic and always secretive precious metals market is run.
The government still has a tight grip over production and exports of gold, platinum, palladium and diamonds.

But on Friday, Russian First Deputy Prime Minister Anatoly Chubais said the country needs radical changes to its gold market and that concrete proposals for liberalising it would be made within the next 10 days.
